price: Ele disse: "Nela vivereis e nela morrereis e dela far-vos-ão sair"
arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla fīhā taḥyawna wafīhā tamūtūna wamin'hā tukh'rajūna
